#Setup directory paths
SET(ROOT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
SET(EXECUTABLE x12a)
SET(INSTALL_PATH external/x12arima)

IF(${SYSTEM} STREQUAL "LINUX")
	SET(VI_X12ARIMA_CURRENT ${ROOT}/${EXECUTABLE})
ELSE()
	MESSAGE(ERROR " The X12Arima executable can only be installed on Linux.")
ENDIF()

INSTALL(FILES ${VI_X12ARIMA_CURRENT} DESTINATION ${INSTALL_PATH})
CONFIGURE_FILE(${VI_X12ARIMA_CURRENT} ${EXECUTABLE} COPYONLY)

SET(X12A_EXECUTABLE_BUILD "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${EXECUTABLE}" CACHE INTERNAL "The X12Arima executable path in the build directory")
SET(X12A_EXECUTABLE_INSTALL "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${INSTALL_PATH}/${EXECUTABLE}" CACHE INTERNAL "The X12Arima executable path in the installation directory")
